articles.title: Vietnam automaker Vinfast opens factory in India, eyeing growth in Asia - AP News
articles.description: Vietnam's Vinfast has begun production at a $500 million electric vehicle plant in India’s Tamil Nadu, part of a larger $2 billion investment to expand into Asian markets. The new factory will start by producing 50,000 EVs a year, with room to triple output. …
articles.content: THOOTHUKUDI, India (AP) Vietnams Vinfast began production at a $500 million electric vehicle plant in southern Indias Tamil Nadu state on Monday, part of a planned $2 billion investment in India and … [+7387 chars]

articles.author: Sudhi Ranjan Sen, Rakesh Sharma, Preeti Soni
articles.title: Modi Defiant as Trump Steps Up Pressure on India’s Russian Oil Purchases - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi struck a defiant tone in the face of US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats, urging the nation to buy local goods as his administration signaled it would continue buying Russian oil.
